code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./css/Card.css";import{DataContext}from"../context/Dataprovider";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductsCard=_ref=>{let{items}=_ref;const{cart,addToCart}=useContext(DataContext);const{id,title}=items;const isItemInCart=cart.find(item=>item.id===id);const handleAddToCart=()=>{if(!isItemInCart){addToCart([...cart,{...items,quantity:1}]);}else{const updatedCart=cart.map(item=>item.id===id?{...item,quantity:item.quantity+1}:item);addToCart(updatedCart);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:items.image,className:"products_image",style:{width:"100%"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"products_details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title",children:items.title.split(' ',2).join(' ')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"prod-desc",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"products_cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"products_price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"",style:{textDecoration:"underline"},children:"Sign in"})," ","or Create an account to see pricing"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-heart ".concat(isItemInCart?"red":""),style:{width:"24px",height:"auto",display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center",fontSize:"24px",cursor:"pointer"},onClick:handleAddToCart})]})})]})]});};export default ProductsCard;
